description: The Strengthening Transparency Integrity and Rule project aims at facilitating national good governance initiatives particularly in Anti-corruption, Legal Sector Reform and Law enforcement, Vital Registration and Communications.

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description: Corruption is effectively addresses through improved institutional capacity, including inclusive and equitable processes and enhanced legal frameworks and mechanisms.
subproject.title: Strengthening Transparency, In

title: Strengthening  Transparency, Integrity & Rule of Law
